string.text: Stalker, you're approaching the Barrier - don't even think about messing around. We're happy to accept any help tho'.
"Marked One, come over here to get your share and further instructions"
Marked One, go back to your position
If you spend the whole night in the Tower in the village something is GUARANTEED to happen...:)
Remember about the mines: one mistake and you're toast…
Marked One, be careful, apparently there's a new anomaly in the village. It moves fast and the bastard's invisible.
Attention all those wishing to liquefy brains: the road to the Radar is protected by a Monolith unit and as you probably know they open fire on everyone. Good luck.
Our task is complete. Retreat to the manor. We can sort out the payment there.
Forward boys! The way is clear!
Marked One, take care of the snipers!!!
Marked One, be careful or you'll catch a bullet…
